```{r}
#| echo: false
#| output: false
library(DBI)
# Create an ephemeral in-memory RSQLite database
con <- dbConnect(RSQLite::SQLite(), ":memory:")
dbWriteTable(con, "mtcars", mtcars)
dbListTables(con)
```

```{sql, connection=con}
SELECT mpg, hp
FROM mtcars 
WHERE cyl = 4
ORDER BY hp ASC
LIMIT 5;
```
